answers.answer: I'm due in August 8th but I'm expecting to be induced by the end of July because I always get preeclampsia.
Im having twins too! I was told the samthing my due date is August 8th but my Ob-gyn said she hopes that I make it to 37weeks.
I am really hoping to make it to the end of July. I'm due the 19th with twins, but I just hope they are healthy enough to not have to be in the NICU. Good luck to you other mamas :-) ♡♡

question: my due date is august 10th, but with me being pregnant with twins, my doctor told me it's more likely ill have them, by July. cause of early labor.
title: ♡
